|Appearances = "[[The Lion and the Rose]]"}}'''JĂłn ĂžĂłr Birgisson''' is the singer and guitarist of the Icelandic post-rock band [[Sigur RĂłs]].

In ''[[Game of Thrones (TV series)|Game of Thrones]]'' he portrayed a [[Musician 1 (The Lion and the Rose)|musician]].
